description:
Good food, good life. Memorable Bites: Since 1939, starting with the Chocolate Chip Cookie, Nestle Toll House Morsels have brought your family the very best in baking for over 75 years. A Morsel of Knowledge: Nestle Toll House Morsels are a key ingredient in making wholesome sweet treats.

Directions
Microwave: Melt 1 cup (6 oz) morsels in uncovered, microwave-safe bowl on high (100%) power for 1 minute; stir. Morsels may retain some of their original shape. If necessary, microwave at additional 10 to 15-second intervals, stirring just until morsels are melted. To melt 2 cups (12 oz) morsels, microwave a few seconds longer.
In Saucepan: Melt morsels in small, heavy-duty saucepan over lowest possible heat. When morsels begin to melt, remove from heat; stir. Return to heat for a few seconds at a time, stirring just until morsels are melted. Immediately remove saucepan from heat once morsels are melted.
For Dipped Fruit: Melt 1 tbsp vegetable shortening and 1 cup (6 oz) morsels as directed above.
title: Nestle Toll House Semi-Sweet Morsels - 12oz

description: Use only the best for your baked goods with the Semi-Sweet Chocolate Mini Morsels from Nestle® Toll House®. Add these adorable little chips to your own recipes or be inspired by the delicious cookie and bar recommended recipes listed on the back of the package. Made with no preservatives, artificial flavors or artificial colors, this premium baking ingredient will give your baked goods lots of chocolaty morsels in each bite.

Morsels may retain some of their original shape. If necessary, microwave at additional 10 to 15-second intervals, stirring just until morsels are melted. description:
The luxuriously deep flavor and smooth texture of Ghirardelli Premium Baking Chocolate delivers the ultimate chocolate indulgence. We hand-select the world's finest cocoa beans and roast them to perfection, then blend the purest ingredients to achieve our award-winning chocolate.

Directions
Stove Top: Place chips in double boiler over gently simmering (not boiling) water. Stir chips constantly until melted.
Microwave: Heat chocolate in a microwave safe container at Medium power (50%) for 1 to 1-1/2 minutes. Stir until bowl no longer feels warm. Continue heating at 15-30 seconds intervals, stirring until smooth.

Storage
Store in a cool and dry place.
title: Ghirardelli 60% Cacao Chocolate Premium Baking Chips - 10oz

description:

Directions
Stove Top: Place chips in double boiler over gently simmering (not boiling) water. Stir chips constantly until melted. Microwave: Heat chocolate in a microwave safe container at medium power (50%) for 1 to 1-1/2 minutes. Stir until bowl no longer feels warm. Continue heating at 15-30 second intervals, stirring until smooth.

Storage
Store in a cool and dry place.

Visit us at www.hersheys.com.

Directions
For rich chocolate desserts, try Hershey's cocoa in recipes calling for baking chocolate. 3 level tablespoons of cocoa + 1 tablespoon shortening or oil = 1 ounce unsweetened baking chocolate. 1 level tablespoon of cocoa + 2 teaspoons shortening + 3-1/2 teaspoons sugar = 1 ounce semi-sweet baking chocolate.

description:
Toll House Morsel. Share the great homemade taste of The Original Nestle Toll House Chocolate Chip Cookie, America's Favorite Cookie Recipe! Good food, good life. Memorable Bites: Since 1939, starting with the Chocolate Chip Cookie, Nestle Toll House Morsels have brought your family the very best in baking for over 75 years.
Directions
Melting (Visit VeryBestBaking.com for more melting tips): Microwave: Melt 1 cup (6 oz.) morsels in uncovered, microwave-safe bowl on medium-high (70%) power for 1 minute; stir. Morsels may retain some of their original shape. If necessary, microwave at additional 10- to 15-second intervals, stirring just until morsels are melted. To melt 2 cups (12 oz.) morsels, microwave a few seconds longer. Double Boiler: Place morsels in top of double boiler over hot (not boiling) water. Do not cover. Prevent water from coming in contact with morsels. When most of the morsels are shiny, stir just until melted. Once melted, immediately remove top pan with melted morsels from bottom pan. For Dipped Fruit: Melt 1 tbsp. vegetable shortening and 1 cup (6 oz.) morsels as directed above.

description:
We've been crafting chocolate for five generations, using a combination of innovative techniques, long-standing relationships and a complete obsession with making the best of the best. Our organic baking wafers celebrate the true artistry of chocolate making - a time-tested craft we've cultivated since my great grandfather Etienne opened doors on San Francisco's Embarcadero in 1868. Used by distinguished pastry chefs and blended from the finest cacao from around the world, each chocolate delivers a unique flavor profile that gives your desserts elegance and style. All natural.

Suggested Applications: ganache; confectionary; mousse; creams; sauces and glazes; ice cream, gelato and sorbet; baking.

description:
Sweet ground cocoa. Rare red Dutch process cocoa powder for baking & hot chocolate. Collection Etienne: Artisan made chocolate. Est. 1868. San Francisco. Peanut free. Gluten free. Collection Etienne Grand Cacao is a truly distinctive beverage, It's the kind of hot chocolate folks enjoyed in the 1920s, when Guittard was located at 139 Main Street in downtown San Francisco. Premium Collection Etienne chocolate, made from the best cacao beans, is finely ground and added into exquisite, old-fashioned, Dutch process cocoa powder. This truly artisan hot chocolate combines intense chocolate flavor, full bodied, creamy texture, rich, red-brown, dark chocolate color and comforting, homemade pudding-like, baked-chocolate aromas. Made in a peanut and gluten free facility. Some settling of contents may occur during shipping.

Directions
Grand Cacao Substitutions: To substitute Grand Cacao for unsweetened Dutch process cocoa powder: replace unsweetened cocoa and an equal amount of sugar with Grand Cacao. For example, if the recipe calls for 1/2 cup Dutch process cocoa and 1 cup sugar, use instead 1 cup Grand Cacao (in place of 1/2 cup cocoa and 1/2 cup of the sugar) and the remaining 1/2 cup sugar. Preparation: For each serving, combine 4 tablespoons Grand Cacao and 1 cup milk in saucepan. Heat on medium-low with constant whisking until hot but not boiling. Pour into cups and serve immediately. Top with fresh whipped cream or, for an Aztec-style beverage, add a stick of cinnamon or a pinch of chili powder to the milk before warming. Alternatively, combine 4 tablespoons Grand Cacao and 1 cup milk in microwave safe mug. Heat on high for 1-1/2 to 2 minutes, stopping and stirring at 30-second intervals to dissolve hot chocolate. Heat to desired temperature.
title: Guittard® Grand Cacao Drinking Chocolate Powder - 10oz
